title: Indian Man Designs Iron Man-Inspired Suit, People Are In Splits Seeing 'Sasta Tony Stark'
text:
We all remember how Tony Stark in Marvel Cinematic Universe build an Iron Man suit and turned into a superhero, which he was meant to be, right?

Since then, a lot of people have made attempts to make Iron Man suit on their own, and to be honest, all of them have been marvellous. Following the footsteps, an Indian man also tried his hands on making an Iron-man suit, but instead of praising his attempt, people are in splits.

In a video shared by RT on Twitter, a man can be seen wearing a metallic green Iron Man-inspired suit. If you’ll notice carefully, there are fire weapons on the hand, shoulder as well as belly. Take a look!

Don't Miss 45.1 K SHARES 14 K SHARES 18 K SHARES 6.5 K SHARES 6.7 K SHARES

Indian man designs ‘Iron Man’ suit to help fight terror! pic.twitter.com/sXXR2bXIjL — RT (@RT_com) October 25, 2019

The caption says that the suit has been designed to fight terrorism and that it may help soldiers stationed at borders.

The video has gone viral on social media, but the crude design has left people in splits. Some of them are even calling him “Sasta Tony Stark”. Take a look at how people reacted.

Sasta Tony Stark...

Utha le re Deva !!!

😭😭😭😭😭😭 https://t.co/4MldRxiNbK — Soul of India (@iamtssh) October 26, 2019

Fight terror with a 9V battery. 🤐 https://t.co/WYZGHVrqlG — nadeem sarwar (@nsnadeemsarwar) October 26, 2019

I just can't stop laughing but I have been told it is not meant to be a joke. 🤣😁🤔 https://t.co/ENOGMfmwPi — Juul e Laal (@antifatwa) October 25, 2019

"Daya, yeh pata lagao ki Abhijit aakhir kya saabit karna chahte hai?" pic.twitter.com/uFCNMuMrH6 — Highly Placed Source (@vox_assamanipur) October 25, 2019

Some time ago, a man had made a real Iron Man suit that could fly 15 feet above ground level. Isn’t that so damn cool?
